attributes.action: allow servicemen and wives of servicemen from the commonwealth an automatic right to stay in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Service persons from overseas who have served in the British Armed Forces and all service person's spouses originally from Commonwealth countries be given the automatic right to British citizenship without qualifying on the current basis as by serving or supporting a member of HM Armed Services they have shown their loyalty to the Crown and UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
